item.title: Best Rapper Alive?
item.dc:creator: @nothing11 nothing11
item.description:
@nothing11 wrote:

[quote=“xerozcheez, post:11, topic:13160”][quote author=nothing11 link=topic=19573.msg224168#msg224168 date=1157671222]

If I were the author of this thread, I would edit it to say “If you’re a racist, rock-loving redneck who’s come to whine about rap then just fuck off because we don’t hate on rock or metal 24/7”

… what are you? a nigger loving little boy that acts hard? oh and i didnt know that everyone who likes rock is racist and every “redneck” is too.
[/quote]

People like you piss me off, you stereotype others just because they stereotype you, making you just as bad, and all he was trying to say is don’t flame his thread. Although a lot of people who listen to rap are 10 year olds thinking they’re hard, a lot of them aren’t and are suprising much more mature than those who listen to rock, I listen to both rap and metal because I don’t see why I should hate one of them for liking the other.[/quote]
aw why because i say nigger? yea dont stereotype others = ( its so mean = ( the world needs to get along right? = (

Read full topic

item.title: Best Rapper Alive?
item.dc:creator: @suck_my_r2h suck my r2h
item.description:
@suck_my_r2h wrote:

I wonder what would happen if I posted that I think that rock sucks in threads about rock music. I’d probably get flamed, people would ask “Why would you post in a thread about rock music if you don’t like it?”, then they would say I have no life, even though they are the same idiots hating on rap 24/7…

Read full topic

item.title: Best Rapper Alive?
item.dc:creator: @googlethis googlethis
item.description:
@googlethis wrote:

Alex Owns:

So I’m racist because I hate the style of rap? And it is not racism if the majority of it is what you are saying I’m racist about. Like I’m generalizing by saying rap is pretty much gangster rap. So I am not a racist, just telling the truth.

Ah feel dem hurtin’ by your words… Oh wait, just because I happen to listen to something other than simple rhymes that hog airwaves doesn’t actually mean I’m redneck OR racist! All the black people I know are my friends…

Read full topic

item.title: Best Rapper Alive?
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

[quote=“nothing11, post:9, topic:13160”][quote author=suck my r2h link=topic=19573.msg223135#msg223135 date=1157616107]
If I were the author of this thread, I would edit it to say “If you’re a racist, rock-loving redneck who’s come to whine about rap then just fuck off because we don’t hate on rock or metal 24/7”
[/quote]
… what are you? a nigger loving little boy that acts hard? oh and i didnt know that everyone who likes rock is racist and every “redneck” is too.[/quote]

People like you piss me off, you stereotype others just because they stereotype you, making you just as bad, and all he was trying to say is don’t flame his thread. Although a lot of people who listen to rap are 10 year olds thinking they’re hard, a lot of them aren’t and are suprising much more mature than those who listen to rock, I listen to both rap and metal because I don’t see why I should hate one of them for liking the other.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Rapper Alive?
item.dc:creator: @suck_my_r2h suck my r2h
item.description:
@suck_my_r2h wrote:

What, just because I like rap, I’m a nigger lover? I’m saying that people that hate on rap 24/7 are MOSTLY racists. Not all. You can’t deny it.

Also, if you were to reply to a thread about a genre of music you don’t even like, it means you’re going out of your way to hate rap. When’s the last time you saw me, or any other person who likes rap EVER spam a rock thread with shit like “OMG ROK SUCKS BALLS”? Never.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Rapper Alive?
item.dc:creator: @suck_my_r2h suck my r2h
item.description:
@suck_my_r2h wrote:

So I’m racist because I hate the style of rap? And it is not racism if the majority of it is what you are saying I’m racist about. Like I’m generalizing by saying rap is pretty much gangster rap. So I am not a racist, just telling the truth.

Regardless, the idea was that if you don’t like rap, why bother posting here? I wouldn’t ever post in a thread about rock because, even though I don’t like it, I don’t hate on rockers 24/7.

Read full topic
